Instruction: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until tender, usually about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain the pasta.
Cook the beef and sausage in a large pot over medium heat until browned; drain. Stir in tomato puree, tomato paste, sugar, salt, garlic, parsley, and let simmer for 30 minutes.
Combine cottage cheese, eggs, ground pepper, grated Parmesan cheese, 1 1/2 tablespoons of parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt in a bowl.
In a medium saucepan, combine the milk, flour, and salt. Cook over medium heat, stirring continually, until the mixture thickens.
Bake lasagna in the preheated oven for 1 hour or until it is hot and bubbly. Allow it to rest for 15 minutes before serving.
